Can influence creature up to Willpower Bonus Klometres away. See DW: Rites of Battle, Page 147. WS 40, BS -, S 16, T 35, Ag 48, Int 20, Per 45, WP 30, Fel -. Movement 2/4/6/12, Wounds 5.
Skills: Awareness +20, Concealment +10, Dodge. Talents: Fearless, Swift Attack. Traits: Bestial, Dark Sight, Flier 12, Natural Weapons (Claws), Size (Puny). Weapons: Claws (1d10+1 R, Pen 2).
